results.title: Explorers of the depths
results.brief_description: An account of the work of Scottish Fisheries Research to determine the causes of reduced fish catches in the North Sea. Sampling the sea-water and plankton at various depths, tagging fish, calculating the age of fish from their scale-ring, discovering the causes for the premature destruction of young fish - these are aspects of the research work which will prove of great importance to the fishermen of Scotland.

results.title: Explorations of Prince Henry
results.brief_description: Presents an overview of the life of Prince Henry of Portugal during the age of exploration. Portrays the annihilation of the Muslims, the expansion of the Christian faith and the discovery of a sea route to India.

results.title: Experimental design
results.creator_credit: Victor Lockwood, BBC-TV and Open University
results.brief_description: Rhys L.L. Davies demonstrates his innovative method of teaching fractions to primary school children. He discusses the methodology he used to test his method against traditional text books and Quizinnaire. Shows Rhys using the three methods with his students in class.

results.title: Experimental
results.creator_credit: Robin Lehman and R A Films
results.brief_description: A quirky history of experimental flight - hang-gliding and helicopters intercut with historical footage, student pranks and a Concorde with a mothergoose smile. Prize winner at 1975 Melbourne Film Festival.

results.title: Exotic Bali
results.brief_description: An introductory travelogue focusing on the potential tourist attractions that Bali has to offer. Areas included are: Farmlife and market life, cultural ceremonies and way of life, cock fighting, a Balanese funeral procession, cultural ceremonies.

results.title: Exit (2016)
results.brief_description: Electronic music video co-created by Snowden that describes the perils of surveillance culture.

constellations_other.name: Orwell & Snowden
constellations_other.description: Explores Orwell as a representation of the NSA, and the infamous Snowden leak.

results.title: Exit
results.creator_credit: Bruce McNaughton, Dennis Meltzer and Aranda Films
results.brief_description: A drama about a group of people stranded at an old wartime guesthouse during a flood. One guest announces that he has the power to “decreate” people and is asked to demonstrate. From an original story by Harry Farjeon. Cast includes: Mark Albiston, Stewart Faichney, Tom Lake, Dina Mann, Brian Moll, John Russell and Sandra Wright.

results.title: Exfoliative cytologic method in the diagnosis of gastric cancer
results.brief_description: Shows how early diagnostic methods of detecting uterine and vaginal cancer in early 1940s have been applied to development of a technique using a gastric balloon to obtain tissue and blood samples to isolate gastric malignancy. Expert comment at conclusion suggests findings have been significant by this method.
results.title_for_label: Exfoliative cytologic method in the diagnosis of gastric cancer

results.title: Excursion to the bridge of friendship
results.creator_credit: Christina Andreef, Helen Bowden, Australian Film Commission, New South Wales Film and Television Office and Puss Puss Productions
results.brief_description: A sophisticated Sydney woman answers a letter from a famous Bulgarian folksinger she doesn’t know in an attempt to build the bridge that will allow a “singing Slav” to break the inner city market of Sydney. A very funny “silent musical”. No dialogue, English subtitles and musical soundtrack.
